description: This file defines a financial analysis agent using the 'agno' framework, including configuration of tools, instructions, and example usage for market analysis prompts.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an AI agent configured with tools, instructions, and behavior for financial analysis.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Class representing the OpenAI chat model used for generating responses.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Class providing tools for financial data retrieval from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and stream a response based on a prompt, using the configured agent.
